atlantic.title: Securing the Republican Advantage
atlantic.topComment: David, you are truly delusional at times. Even if the 27% of the vote that the midterms pulled in actually represented the views of the majority - you tiptoe and dance around everything but the concrete facts of what it would actually take to do anyt...

atlantic.title: The Food Babe: Enemy of Chemicals
